fullplot: Douglas is a foreign entrepreneur, who ventures to Russia in 1885 with dreams of selling a new, experimental steam-driven timber harvester in the wilds of Siberia. Jane is his assistant, who falls in love with a young Russian officer, Andrè, and spends the next 10 years perfecting the harvester and pursuing her love, who has been exiled to Siberia.
